name: Seated Spinal Twist
desc: Sit tall. Reach for the back of your chair and twist. Look over your shoulder.

name: Desk Wrist Extension
desc: Place palms on desk, fingers facing you. Lean back gently. Stretch those typing muscles.

name: Seated Figure-Four
desc: Ankle over opposite knee. Lean forward with a flat back. Feel the glute stretch.

name: Neck CARs
desc: Slowly rotate your neck in the largest circle possible. Controlled Articular Rotations.

name: Seated Neck Side-Stretch
desc: Hold the bottom of your chair with one hand. Lean your head to the opposite side.

name: Desk Pectoral Stretch
desc: Forearm on desk edge. Step forward and turn away. Open up the chest.

name: Seated Cat-Cow
desc: Hands on knees. Arch your back and look up, then round your back and look down.

name: Chin Tucks
desc: Pull your chin straight back like you're making a double chin. Fix that tech-neck.

name: Scapular Shrugs
desc: Shrug shoulders to ears, then squeeze them down and back. Repeat.

name: Seated Hamstring Stretch
desc: One leg straight out, heel on floor. Lean forward from the hips.

name: Wrist Circles
desc: Interlock fingers. Rotate wrists in both directions. Move them like they're oiled.

name: Overhead Reach
desc: Reach for the ceiling. Interlace fingers and push palms up. Get tall.

name: Shoulder Blade Squeezes
desc: Imagine a pencil between your shoulder blades. Squeeze it. Hold for 5 seconds.

name: Eagle Arms Stretch
desc: Cross arms at elbows and wrists. Lift elbows up. Open the upper back.

name: Triceps Desk Stretch
desc: Elbows on desk, hands behind head. Drop your head between your arms.

name: Seated Lateral Lean
desc: One hand on chair leg, reach other arm over your head to the side.

name: Ankle Pumps
desc: Point toes away, then pull them back. Keep the blood flowing while sitting.

name: Shoulder Rolls
desc: Big circles. Up, back, down, forward. Loosen the tension.

name: Chair Pigeon Pose
desc: Same as Figure-Four but push the knee down gently for more intensity.

name: Standing Desk Quad Stretch
desc: Stand, hold desk for balance. Grab your ankle behind you. Knees together.
